Filipino(fil): Pag-aralan natin ang tamang pagdaan sa intersection. Tandaan na 20kph ang speed limit sa intersection. Subukang KUMANAN sa susunod na intersection.
English(en): Let's learn how to use the intersection correctly. Note that the max speed in intersections is 20kph. First, Try turning RIGHT on the next intersection.

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na sa tuwing kakanan sa intersection, manatili sa kanang lane. Ngayon, bumalik sa intersection at KUMALIWA.
English(en): Remember that when turning right on an intersection, make sure to position yourself on the Right lane.  Next, go back to the intersection and turn LEFT.

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na sa tuwing kakanan sa intersection, manatili sa kanang lane. Ngayon, bumalik sa intersection at KUMALIWA.
English(en): Remember that when turning right on an intersection, make sure to position yourself on the Right lane.  Next, go back to the intersection and turn LEFT.

Filipino(fil): Ikaw ay kumaliwa, imbis na kumanan.
English(en): You performed a left turn instead of a right turn.

Filipino(fil): Ikaw ay nag-U-turn, imbis na kumanan.
English(en): You performed a U-turn instead of a right turn.

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na kapag kakaliwa sa intersection, mas ligtas na pumasok sa inner lane. Ngayon, bumalik sa intersection at mag-U-TURN naman.
English(en): When turning left, prefer merging on the inner lane to minimize possible crashes (e.g. with other vehicles merging via a left turn). Next, return to the Intersection and perform a U-TURN carefully.

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na kapag kakaliwa sa intersection, mas ligtas na pumasok sa inner lane. Ngayon, bumalik sa intersection at mag-U-TURN naman.
English(en): When turning left, prefer merging on the inner lane to minimize possible crashes (e.g. with other vehicles merging via a left turn). Next, return to the Intersection and perform a U-TURN carefully.

Filipino(fil): Ikaw ay kumanan, imbis na kumaliwa.
English(en): You performed a right turn instead of a left turn!

Filipino(fil): Ikaw ay nag-U-turn, imbis na kumaliwa.
English(en): You performed a U-turn instead of a left turn.

Filipino(fil): Kagaya ng pagliko sa kanana, mag-U-turn sa inner lane. Ngayon, bumalik muli sa intersection at DUMIRETSO lang.
English(en): Similar to Right turns, prefer U-turning on the inner lane. Position yourself in the correct lane in advance. Finally, return to the intersection and go STRAIGHT through it.

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na sa tuwing kakanan sa intersection, dapat nasa kanang lane ka rin. Ngayon, bumalik sa intersection at KUMALIWA.
English(en): Remember that when turning right on an intersection, make sure to position yourself on the Right lane.  Next, go back to the intersection and turn LEFT.

Filipino(fil): Ikaw ay kumaliwa, imbis na mag-U-turn.
English(en): You performed a left turn instead of a U-turn!

Filipino(fil): Ikaw ay kumanan, imbis na mag-U-turn.
English(en): You performed a right turn instead of a U-turn!

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na sundin ang traffic lights. Kung wala, magmaneho parin nang mahinahon at maging mapagmasid sa ibang kotse sa daan.
English(en): For intersections with traffic lights, make sure to follow the signals. Otherwise, drive carefully and observe if there are oncoming vehicles before proceeding.

Filipino(fil): Tandaan na sundin ang traffic lights. Kung wala, magmaneho parin nang mahinahon at maging mapagmasid sa ibang kotse sa daan.
English(en): For intersections with traffic lights, make sure to follow the signals. Otherwise, drive carefully and observe if there are oncoming vehicles before proceeding.
